alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw; Clayton; Fayette; Floyd (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 27 at 2:58AM CST until January 28 at 9:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Snowfall Saturday With Some Travel Impacts Expected... .A narrow band of snow is expected to push into parts of northeast Iowa and far southwest Wisconsin on Saturday. The heaviest snowfall will occur Saturday morning into the early afternoon. With the current storm track, total accumulations of 3 to 5 inches look likely. Impacts to travel are likely throughout the day. Monitor the forecast if you have plans to travel Saturday. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 9 PM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. * WHERE...In Iowa, Floyd, Chickasaw, Fayette and Clayton Counties. In Wisconsin, Grant County. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 9 PM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Iowa, visit 511ia.org for road conditions. In Wisconsin, visit 511wi.gov for road conditions.
